source.556d6f16: Dependant Variable : Age Independant Variables : 1. PassengerId 2. Survived 3. Pclass 4. Name 5. Sex 6. SibSp 7. Parch 8. Ticket 9. Fare 10. Cabin 11. Embarked Type of Variable: A. Categorical- Sex, Embarked B. Numerical - PassengerId, Survived, SibSp, Parch, Fare, Pclass Data Types: A. Strings- Name, Sex, Ticket, Cabin, Embarked B. Numerical- PassengerId, Survived, Pclass, Age, SibSp, Parch, Fare Variable Category: A. Categorical- Sex, Embarked B. Continuous- PassengerId, Age, SibSp, Parch, Fare C. Dicrete- Survived, Pclass
